summary: A model class that encapsulates the MRA architecture for token-level classification tasks, managing configuration, model parameters, and providing the core functionality needed to train and infer token labels within a sequence.
business_intent: To provide a ready-to-use component for organizations to perform fine-grained token labeling such as named entity recognition or part‑of‑speech tagging using the MRA model, streamlining NLP pipelines and improving labeling accuracy.
